devdoc.details: Provides gas-optimized methods for reading storage and modules with pagination.

params.safe: The address of the Safe contract.

returns.config: The basic SafeConfiguration with owners, threshold, fallbackHandler, nonce, guard, and an empty modules array.

params.pageSize: Number of modules to fetch per iteration.
params.safe: The address of the Safe contract.

returns.nextCursor: Cursor for additional pagination (address(0) if none left).

params.pageSize: The maximum number of modules to retrieve.
params.safe: The address of the Safe contract.
params.start: The starting module address (use SENTINEL_MODULES for first page).

returns.modulePage: List of module addresses in the retrieved page.
returns.nextCursor: Address cursor for the next page (address(0) if end reached).

SENTINEL_MODULES.details: Sentinel address for module linked-list iteration.

devdoc.title: Safe Configuration Fetcher

getBasicConfiguration(address).notice: Returns the basic Safe configuration (excluding modules, modules array will be empty).

getFullConfiguration(address,uint256,uin.notice: Returns the full Safe configuration, including all modules up to the specified cap.

getModulesPaginated(address,address,uint.notice: Returns a page of Safe modules and the next cursor for pagination.

userdoc.notice: A utility contract to fetch basic and full configurations of a Safe.
